If necessary, you can leave the car for the night, but you can pick up the car only after 8 a.m.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Useful
